meanings: (뿌리 깊이 박인 성질) (a) nature, (a) temper, (a) disposition, spirit
(끈질긴 성질) will power, guts(구어), fighting spirit, grit, tenacity, doggedness

vlive.korean: 근성 있다? - 근성 있다? Someone with grit? - Someone with grit? 듣기 View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : 첫방송 D-10 "월드 클래스를 소개합니다!" / Premiere D-10 "Meet WORLD KLASS!"

examples.korean: He was hoping to be content with married life, but once a Casanova, always a Casanova. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 결혼 생활에 만족하기를 원했지만, 바람둥이 근성은 변하지 않았다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: He was hoping to be content with married life, but once a Casanova, always a Casanova. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I have been with Singapore Airlines for the last 3 years and during these years I have heard a lot of passengers comment on my professionalism and warm service. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 과거 3년간 싱가폴 항공에서 근무하면서 승객들로부터 저의 프로근성과 따뜻한 서비스에 관한 피드백을 많이 들었습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I have been with Singapore Airlines for the last 3 years and during these years I have heard a lot of passengers comment on my professionalism and warm service. Add to Wordbook
